CustomField.formula: if ( or ( LEFT(Phone,2)="(0", LEFT(Phone,4)="(123", LEFT(Phone,4)="(111", LEFT(Phone,4)="(222", LEFT(Phone,4)="(333", LEFT(Phone,4)="(444", LEFT(Phone,4)="(555", LEFT(Phone,4)="(666", LEFT(Phone,4)="(777", LEFT(Phone,4)="(888", LEFT(Phone,4)="(999", LEFT(Phone,1)="0", LEFT(Phone,3)="123", LEFT(Phone,3)="111", LEFT(Phone,3)="222", LEFT(Phone,3)="333", LEFT(Phone,3)="444", LEFT(Phone,3)="555", LEFT(Phone,3)="666", LEFT(Phone,3)="777", LEFT(Phone,3)="888", LEFT(Phone,3)="999", LEN(Phone)<10), "DCW#", "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to capture bad phone numbers, moved to Opportunity with mapping.
CustomField.label: DCW#
